title.rendered: Vantage Markets Expands Web Access to Copy Trading via Client Portal

content.rendered:
Vantage Markets has announced the rollout of its Copy Trading feature on the Vantage Client Portal website, expanding browser-based access to a tool that was previously limited to its mobile app. This development enhances accessibility across the broker’s supported regions and offers both new and existing clients the ability to replicate strategies from top-performing traders directly through the web platform.

To support the launch, Vantage has introduced a deposit bonus promotion, allowing eligible users to receive up to 50% in credit bonus when opening a Copy Trading account via the Client Portal. The feature enables users to mirror trades from seasoned signal providers in real-time, eliminating the need for advanced market knowledge.

Enabling convenience and broader access for traders

Marc Despallieres, CEO of Vantage Markets, commented, “At Vantage, we are continuously working to democratize access to financial markets. By bringing Copy Trading to our Client Portal, we’re providing greater flexibility and convenience for our users. This expansion reflects our commitment to innovation and helping traders – both new and experienced – make more informed trading decisions, with the tools and support they need.”

The web-based Copy Trading platform replicates the core functionality of its mobile counterpart. It includes rapid account registration, integrated TradingView charting tools, and access to daily market analysis. Traders can engage with US stock CFDs commission-free, though standard trading fees may still apply.

The company has framed Copy Trading as an entry point for those looking to diversify their strategies or engage with financial markets through the expertise of professional traders. By integrating the feature into the Client Portal, Vantage aims to simplify onboarding and increase its prominence within the broker’s broader trading ecosystem.

Users who open Copy Trading accounts through the web platform gain access to a suite of resources including technical indicators, real-time tracking of trades, and Vantage’s in-house market research and analysis. The broker says these tools are designed to boost trader confidence while providing a transparent view of live trading activity.

Vantage Markets offers multi-asset trading across a broad range of CFDs, including Forex, commodities, indices, ETFs, equities, and bonds. The broker supports both web and mobile trading experiences, delivers over 220 product analyses daily, and continues to emphasize user education and intuitive trading environments.
